pullRequest.body: This PR removes the old `mergeSort'` in Mathlib (which was *not* a stable sort algorithm), replacing all uses with the stable `mergeSort` from Lean, mostly preserving the API.

I thought these comments were a cute demonstration of computability, I wouldn't want to see them go.

Can we turn this into an `example` instead?
We have more of such examples in mathlib...

pullRequest.title: chore: cleanup of `mergeSort'`
